author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
In realms of iron and artful mind,
Where axioms weighty, cunning bind,
’Tis Altman, OpenAI’s chief, doth plea,
Let hand with China joined e’er be.

A miracle hath graced the green,
Four babes, from ashen skies unseen,
Survived they crash, through thicket roamed,
Till Amazon’s embrace, they’re homed.

Now, cometh forth this lesson strange,
On beauty’s fickle, dread exchange,
Esteem unearned mires fair face,
In filaments of pride's embrace.

feedItems.title: OpenAI CEO Calls for Collaboration With China to Counter AI Risks
feedItems.description: As the U.S. seeks to contain China’s progress in artificial intelligence though sanctions, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman is choosing engagement.

feedItems.title: Four children, including a baby, were found alive in the Amazon jungle nearly six weeks after they survived the crash of a small plane and wandered into the wilderness, Colombia's president said.
feedItems.description: Four children, including a baby, were found alive in the Amazon jungle nearly six weeks after they survived the crash of a small plane and wandered into the wilderness, Colombia’s president said.

feedItems.title: The Moral Hazards of Being Beautiful
feedItems.description: Research shows that attractive people tend to receive unearned esteem from others and cultivate self-serving beliefs.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
Of TV's peak, the stars so bright,
Caught in the midst, their hearts ignite,
As nature's creatures we revel on,
The stage that dost hold their light anon.

Elon Musk and CEO fair,
Twitter's couple, an odd affair,
With no accord or contract made,
Can they as one foray or fade?

In Poland's den, a tale of strife,
Saboteurs plot through Baltic life,
Nord Stream pipelines, a Russian quest,
By stealthy hands, they seek unrest.

feedItems.title: The True Stars of Peak TV Are Caught in the Middle
Can Twitter's Odd Couple Make It Work? Elon Musk and His New CEO Are About to Find Out
feedItems.description: Musk announced her arrival before she had a contract. They haven’t formally agreed on a budget or headcount. And Linda Yaccarino hasn’t even gotten to the hard part yet.

feedItems.title: German investigators are examining evidence that suggests a sabotage team used Poland as an operating base to blow up the Nord Stream pipelines built to transport Russian gas through the Baltic Sea.
feedItems.description: German investigators are examining evidence that suggests a sabotage team used Poland as an operating base to blow up the Nord Stream pipelines built to transport Russian gas through the Baltic Sea.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
In parchment old, the truth revealed,
The secrets held by Trump concealed,
Of military's hidden treasures,
Brought forth unto the people's measures.

From o'er the sea, in Albion's mist,
Lies Johnson, caught in scandal's twist,
Resigns as knight in Commons' Hall,
By truth's firm gavel, he did fall.

In Kyiv, brave warriors take the field,
To free their land, they shan't yield,
Probing defenses, they seek a crack,
To press the foes, and thus fight back.

feedItems.title: Federal prosecutors unsealed a sweeping 49-page indictment against Trump alleging the former president held on to sensitive military secrets he knew he shouldn't have retained access to, shared them with others and directed his staff to help him evade authorities' efforts to get them back.
feedItems.description: Federal prosecutors unsealed a sweeping 49-page indictment against Trump alleging the former president held on to sensitive military secrets he knew he shouldn’t have retained access to, shared them with others and directed his staff to help him evade authorities’ efforts to get them back.

feedItems.title: Former U.K. leader Boris Johnson said he would step down as a lawmaker following a probe into whether he lied to Parliament about his attendance at a series of parties during Covid lockdowns.
feedItems.description: Former U.K. leader Boris Johnson said he would step down as a lawmaker following a probe into whether he lied to Parliament about his attendance at a series of parties during Covid lockdowns.

feedItems.title: Ukrainian forces were probing Russian defenses as Kyiv searched for weak points that could allow it to break through Russian lines and retake occupied territory as part of its long-anticipated counteroffensive.
feedItems.description: Ukrainian forces were probing Russian defenses as Kyiv searched for weak points that could allow it to break through Russian lines and retake occupied territory as part of its long-anticipated counteroffensive.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
Upon the tides of worldly news,
With ink and feathered quill we muse,
Of events near and far we spin,
A web of tales to sail entire kin.

In halls where children sing and play,
Lurk secrets that do lead astray,
The serpent’s hiss, a whisper charm,
To shield our kin from hazard's harm.

The trial of a leader bold,
On path of power, both new and old,
Through tempest, storm, and lightning's flash,
His tale unfoldeth, on empire's clash.

feedItems.title: The Case for Banning TikTok and Other Socials for Kids Under 16
feedItems.description: Doctors and policy makers say that 13 is too young for social media. Science suggests waiting would be better.

feedItems.title: Trump Faces 2024 Split Screen of Campaign, Criminal Trials
feedItems.description: The former president’s indictment ensures his legal woes will be front and center through the GOP primaries and next year’s general election.
